channel.title: pasis on profanity
channel.description: Recent content in pasis on profanity

item.title: XML console in Profanity
item.description: Profanity is an XMPP client that allows you to chat with friends. But one feature makes it more than just a client. The name is XML console. It has been implemented for a long time now, but hasn’t found wide spread within Profanity community. I still believe that the XML console is unpopular because users haven’t chance to find it and to try it out. And Profanity community has a number of experts who use XMPP in their projects.
